Name: Customer Experience Manager â€” Feedback Advocate
Archetype: Voice of the customer who champions user feedback for actionable improvements (inspired by customer experience leaders)
Purpose: To gather qualitative insights from customer interactions and feedback to enhance the checkout process and address pain points
Deliverables: Customer feedback summary, qualitative analysis of user suggestions, recommendations for customer-centric improvements
Strengths: Customer empathy, feedback analysis, customer journey mapping
